TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XPathItem extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An item is either a node or an atomic value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the item represents an XPath node or an atomic value.
Docs.value: if the item represents an XPath node; if the item represents an atomic value.
Docs.returns: if the item represents an XPath node; if the item represents an atomic value.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](../../add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.
Docs.value: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the TypedValue property is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.Value%2A> property.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](../Topic/Type%20Support%20in%20the%20System.Xml%20Classes.md).

Docs.returns: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value of the item.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type returnType) cil managed

Docs.param: The type to return the item value as.
Docs.summary: Returns the item's value as the specified type.
Docs.returns: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When overridden in a derived class, the ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](../../add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.

Docs.exception: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
The attempted cast is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Docs.value: The value of the item as the type requested.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object ValueAs (Type returnType, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type returnType, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver) cil managed

Docs.param: The type to return the item's value as.
The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
Docs.returns: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When overridden in a derived class, the ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](../../add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.
The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](../Topic/Type%20Support%20in%20the%20System.Xml%20Classes.md).

Docs.exception: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
The attempted cast is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Docs.value: The value of the item as the type requested.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAsDateTime%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](../../add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Boolean> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](../Topic/Type%20Support%20in%20the%20System.Xml%20Classes.md).

Docs.exception: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Boolean> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Boolean> is not valid.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ValueAsDateTime property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](../../add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.DateTime> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](../Topic/Type%20Support%20in%20the%20System.Xml%20Classes.md).

Docs.exception: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.DateTime> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.DateTime> is not valid.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a <xref:System.Double>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ValueAsDouble property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](../../add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Double> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](../Topic/Type%20Support%20in%20the%20System.Xml%20Classes.md).

Docs.exception: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Double> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Double> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ValueAsInt property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](../../add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int32> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](../Topic/Type%20Support%20in%20the%20System.Xml%20Classes.md).

Docs.exception: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int32> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int32> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ValueAsLong property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](../../add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] <xref:System.Int64> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](../Topic/Type%20Support%20in%20the%20System.Xml%20Classes.md).

Docs.exception: The item's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int64> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int64> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](../../add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
Docs.value: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item. The default value is <xref:System.String>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When overridden in a derived class, the ValueType property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item.
For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a ValueType of <xref:System.Int32> by default. However, the ValueType could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](../Topic/Type%20Support%20in%20the%20System.Xml%20Classes.md).

Docs.returns: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item. The default value is <xref:System.String>.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the for the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When overridden in a derived class, the XmlType property gets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> for the item. For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.
